title: Gentlemen's Hardware 5-in-1 Barbecue Multitool for Grilling
features: This all in one barbecue multitool features five tools: a spatula, fork, 2 bottle openers, corkscrew, and barbecue basting brush
The tool is detachable: open the spatula and simply slide the handle apart, which allows you to have a spatula in one hand and a fork in the other
Constructed of stainless steel that locks back into place when folded up
Gentlemen's hardware products have been crafted for the rigors of today's modern life: truly excellent products manufactured by relentless pioneers
Gentlemen's Hardware is a registered Trademark of Wild and Wolf Inc.
description: Gentlemen's Hardware presents its handy and stylish multitools. With its rugged build and beautiful packaging, this multi-tool for outdoor grilling and includes two bottle openers, spatula and a fork and grill brush. These tools were engineered to be elegant and tough for all those handy men out there.
